item.description:
Specific Topic:  Making Change Fun

Specifically, this is about Change work in NLP through language patterns and role play.  This session is valuable for both practitioners and anyone else who wants to learn about NLP techniques like these and make changes for themselves.

This, of course will be interactive with demos and exercises for everyone.

 

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin 978-273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Methuen - Making Change Fun
